name: order-byu
title: Paket Data by.U
description: Melakukan pemesanan paket data by.U ke nomor tujuan.

parameters.name: target_number
parameters.label: Nomor by.U Tujuan
parameters.placeholder: Nomor HP yang akan diisi paket data byu

curl:
curl -X POST https://bovalone.me/api/order-byu \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"auth_token":"...", "auth_username":"...", "target_number":"...", "voucher_id":"..."}'
